title: Ethereum & Smart Contracts
description: Learn about Ethereum blockchain and smart contract development.

questions.question: What is Ethereum?
options: A blockchain platform for smart contracts
questions.explanation: Ethereum is a blockchain platform that enables the creation of smart contracts and decentralized applications.

questions.question: What programming language is primarily used for Ethereum smart contracts?
questions.explanation: Solidity is the primary programming language used for writing Ethereum smart contracts.

questions.question: What is Gas in Ethereum?
options: The fee paid for transactions and smart contract execution
questions.explanation: Gas is the fee paid in Ether for transactions and smart contract execution on Ethereum.

questions.question: Smart contracts are automatically executed when conditions are met.
questions.explanation: Smart contracts automatically execute when predefined conditions are met, without human intervention.

questions.question: What is the native cryptocurrency of Ethereum?
questions.explanation: Ether (ETH) is the native cryptocurrency of the Ethereum blockchain.
